DOC.criteria: Male Female age 18 year . Genetic bleeding disorder Currently Pregnant Oral Contraceptives On anticoagulant antiplatelet therapy Took ASA ( Acetylsalicylic Acid ) within 1 week prior Recent surgery ( within 4 week ) Recent injury lead substantial bruising ( within 2 week )
